title: Emmanuel KALISA
subtitle: Rwandans react to the imminent arrival of refugees from Libya. And yet after years of preparation, Rwanda is finally in the process of receiving 500 refugees from Libya. This is Rwandan humanitarian to welcome our brotherhood from Africa. pic.twitter.com/eAMMCJE6dD

title: NBS Television
subtitle:
Bidi Bidi Refugee Settlement is facing another humanitarian crisis; shortage of firewood. The refugees have cut down almost all the trees in the area. 
#NBSLiveAt9 #NBSUpdatespic.twitter.com/QMmFs32bVw

title: UNHCR Uganda
subtitle:
Imagine if you were forced to flee your home to save yourself.

Imagine if you were then told you couldn’t finish school because you had no way of proving all your previous hard work. 

This is the reality for thousands of refugee children. http://trib.al/eXMDFaJ pic.twitter.com/5ke9T9HVMq

title: Kenya Red Cross
subtitle: We will be joining other Kenyans in the #StepForSafety walk on 8th September 2019. The issue of refugees is a humanitarian issue and we stand in solidarity with the over 24 million Africans who have fled their homes. #WithRefugees. Join us!pic.twitter.com/Dk0TrVV5KK

title: Dr. Jane Ruth Aceng
subtitle: Yesterday, 3rd September 2019, I inaugurated the Steering Committee for the Intergrated Refugee Response plan for health. This steering committee comes in at a time when Uganda is hosting 1.3million Refugees. pic.twitter.com/3UXHNY9hD0

title: SPRS-NU
subtitle: "There homes are our homes. Our homes are there homes." says Susan a South Sudanese refugee.This is how refugees & host communities coexist in Rhino Camp. United! pic.twitter.com/mmPAxUYnMM
